Material used.Description: Experiments conducted using fruit fly and mouse models to study PINK1 dysfunction.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were reduced in PINK1 mutant models.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were used for each model.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Control cells without PINK1 were used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
